body.name: CHARMOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount 26-55 Inch, Ultra-Slim Low Profile TV Mount with Max VESA 400x400mm, Small Wall Mount TV Bracket for Flat Screen TVs, Holds up to 99lbs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: Space Saving - The ultra-slim TV wall mount holds your TV with 0.9" flush profile away from the wall, for greatly saving room space. The small low profile TV mount keeps a sleek and tidy appearance after mounted.

Solid Construction - Made of sturdy cold-rolled steel, CHARMOUNT fixed wall TV mount 32 to 55 inch can effortlessly provide up to 99 lbs loading capacity, ensuring reliable strength and built-to-last performance.

Safety Design - CHARMOUNT wall TV mount is designed with safety screws at the bottom of TV rack as well as anti-drop baffle. The TV wall mounts prevent your TV from falling off, creating a safe environment for you.

Universal Compatibility - The fixed TV wall mount fits most 26, 32, 40, 43, 50 in, 55 inch OLED,LED,LCD,4K flat screen TV. This TV mounting bracket is compatible with VESA from 75x75m to 400x400mm, fits Max 16" Stud Spacing.

Easy Installation - The flat screen TV mounts for wall comes with step-to-step instruction and pre-labled mounting hardware for easy installation. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. 100% satisfaction guarantee! Buy with confidence! (TV Screw: M6*25, M8*25, M8*45)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good price, easy install except for the 2 anchor screws. An engineer must have developed this without being required to install one him/her self.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple sturdy and cost effective
reviews.reviewText: I never understood why tv mounts cost so much..I used this mount on an older tv that had hung on the wall with an 11.99 mount from monoprice for 7 years with no problem. This mount is made sturdy and simple and the slim profile is great, especially for a slightly thinker older LCD TV.Honestly the only issue with this mount would be instalation error, and that would be the mounts fault..would buy again for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for TV's on the smaller side
reviews.reviewText: Good quality at this price. I used this to mount a 42" TV with 400X200 Vesa pattern. 400mm wide pushes this bracket to its maximum. Since bracket mounts to studs, there is really no way to center it on the wall as you cannot slide it left or right. My biggest complaint is the screws on the bottom for tightening the TV to the bracket. I have a Phillips over a foot long and it isn't long enough to reach under the bottom of the TV. I will need to buy a longer screwdriver to make this work. In hindsight, I should have bought a bigger bracket with the locking bar you slide in from the side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. Size of back plate makes mounting easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple Part, Great Product, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I use to remember when TV mounts cost a lot of $$.This product is just as good as those "name brand" mounts but more then have the cost. The unit comes in a small box but the product is well made and comes with everything that you need.I knew exactly what I was looking for, small enough to hide, thin enough to be "almost" flushed to the wall.This little unit is a great item to get to hang up your TV. Make sure you get the right TV Mount for the size of your TV. This one came with everything you need. Remember, if you need it to tilt, move away from the wall or to view from an different angle, then this is not what you are looking for.If you want a simple, thin TV Mount at a great price, then look no further. Definitely recommend this product.
Easy to install and love the versatility of swivel. Bought another one for my other room. Excellent project.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only works on 16in center studs or less
reviews.reviewText: It isn't any bigger than it needs to be so make sure your studs are 16" apart or less. Comes with very sturdy mounting hardware. The mount itself isn't as beefy as other mounts I've used in the past but holds a 55inch no problem. The safety screw needs a long extension for a drill bit or an unnaturally long screwdriver to tighten. There is a picture review that shows 10inches but that will be different for different TVs

reviews.reviewTitle: Installation requires special tools and care.
reviews.reviewText: Well at $20 CAD how could I resist. A few things you should know before buying this. If your TV only has HDMI inputs coming outward from the back you will need a special 90 degree HDMI cord because your TV will be too close to the wall for a regular cord that sticks out when plugged in.Also you definitely want to find the studs in your wall which must be no farther than 16 inches apart from each other. You will need a drill with a 4.5mm (3/16 in) drill bit. Do not try screwing it into just drywall, your TV will fall out and break.The worst part about this mount is the screws provided to screw into the wall. Even though they are hefty they are made of a soft metal and strip very easily. They have a hexagon head that is a funny size. Neither my 3/8 in or 7/16 in hex drill bit fit on the screw tightly. I had to dig out my automobile socket wrench set for the Number 10 socket which fit perfectly. Seriously don't try to install this without the No. 10 socket. Even though there are Philips head slots, there's no way you can screw them into the wall tightly, as the screws strip very easily.The last annoying part is two screws you must tighten to secure the brackets attached to the TV to the bracket attached to the wall. But since the screws are less than an inch from the wall it's near impossible to tighten them without a foot long or more screwdriver.That said, once it was all installed it seems pretty secure and it's nice to have my TV on the wall to save space and have it exactly the level I want it. Lucky I had all the tools needed but you might get frustrated if you have a limited selection of tools. Mainly that No. 10 socket. Cheers and good luck.

reviews.reviewTitle: Facile a installer et de bonne qualité
reviews.reviewText: Est pour installer téléviseur au mur.
